resources.string: Required permissions were not given.\nSpotless cannot detect and block ads.
An ad was detected: muting for a while!
That\'s %s ads muted so far,\nor %s less spent listening to ads.
This is the current mute status.

Spotless need permissions to read the notifications on your device to run properly.

Please note that Spotless cannot work without this permission, but that it is solely used for the purpose of detecting Spotify ads and muting them. No data will be extracted from your phone, ever.

Click yes to be taken to the Settings screen where you'll be able to give the required permissions to Spotless.
Spotless is enabled.\nYou can start listening to Spotify!
